name: Honor Amongst Thieves
description:
Set in the Everhaze, a world with floating islands, flying beasts, and an eternal fog covering most the planet. It was a casual night of drinking in Havenhall with the usual ruckus and din. Veteran pirate, scalawag, and ace of games, Anders Magnus has never claimed to be a good man - but alas, the rogue is not as heartless as he ought to be. When blood is spilled over a game of cards, the wretchedness of the pirating world finally pushes him over the edge.

Open full game webpage in new tab: https://everhazegame.myportfolio.com/
